comment.author: 63964925@N07
comment._content:
FILM CANISTER or CHEMICAL CANISTER? 
Watching Rosalind Peterson's Interview The Chemtrail Cover-Up, she describes she has joined some meetings at NASA aims about atmospheric testing programs where she noticed that the astronauts would take caniters filled with chemicals that would be shutted upon the space shuttle and on rockets. NASA would sent canisters packed with Sulfate hexa fluoride (man-made chemical that exarcebates global warming), Ba, Al, Trimethal Al, Strontium, Li. They would take the canister and release it in different levels of the atmosphere. To do ionosphere testings they would super-heat these released chemicals until they exploded. They'd keep on doing these chemical reactions and see many colorful light shows any things like that.
